titles.title: Electing Representative Sanders of Vermont to the Committee on Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs and to the Committee on Government Operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Elects Representative Bernie Sanders to the House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs and the House Committee on Government Operations.
